metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45364 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in includes/page/Article.php in MediaWiki 1.36.x through 1.39.x before 1.39.5 and 1.40.x before 1.40.1. Deleted revision existence is leaked due to incorrect permissions being checked. This reveals that a given revision ID belonged to the given page title, and its timestamp, both of which are not supposed to be public information.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
